create_aspiration_description: An aspiration is a goal you want to achieve. You can create new aspirations and manage them here.
delete_aspiration_description: Are you sure you want to delete this aspiration?
restore_aspiration_description: Are you sure you want to restore this aspiration?

unarchive_aspiration_description: Are you sure you want to unarchive this aspiration?
